note.p: Career: Also studied at Marburg, Bonn, Leipzig and Paris; returned to Scotland; Assistant to Alexander Crum Brown (FRS 1879); Chemist and Physicist to the Challenger Expedition; owned a steam yacht; involved cable laying; undertook researches in oceanography with Prince Albert I of Monaco; Lecturer on Geography, University of Cambrdige
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1926 vol 110 pp xii-xiii, plate, signed by A E S
